subtitle: Channel of highest highs/lowest lows over a window (breakout tool).

measures.how_to_read: Price breaking above upper band suggests bullish breakout; below lower band suggests bearish breakout.
measures.typical_ranges: 20 periods common; longer windows reduce signals.
measures.caveats: Many breakouts fail in choppy markets; consider volume confirm.
measures.what_it_measures: Channel of highest high and lowest low over a window.

assistant_hints: Confirm breaks with volume or retests to reduce false signals.
Favor pullback entries after the breakout rather than chasing.
Avoid trading Donchian signals in tight chop.
Align with higher timeframe trend for better odds.
beginner_summary: Channel of highest highs/lowest lows over a window (breakout tool).
